pages.title: Aesthetic Mechanisms
pages.text: There are a few purely decorative <thing>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)mechanisms/$ that can be placed in the same blockspace as <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)gears, axles, etc/$.$(br2)

pages.title: Axle Mounts
pages.text: <item>Axle Mounts/$ are purely decorative 'clamps' that hold <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)axles/$ and attach to a solid

wall, ceiling or floor to make <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)axles/$ look supported instead of being free floating.$(br2)Several can be in the same blockspace, and they do not obstruct <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)gear/$ connections. <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)Axles/$ <em>can not/$ connect through them if they are placed <em>between/$ <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)axles/$, instead of alongside them. They come in every material that can be used to make gears.$(br2)

pages.title: Facades
pages.text: <item>Facades/$ are purely decorative panels that look like normal blocks and can cover up

<item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)gears & axles/$. Several can be in the same blockspace, they are solid to walk on, and they do not obstruct <item>$(l:essentials:rotary/gear_base)gear & axle/$ connections at all. They do not need a solid supporting block, and come in four varieties: Stone Bricks, Cobblestone, Iron Blocks, and Glass.$(br2)
